about_the_game:
Take possession of an over-armed spaceship to succeed in the Space Show challenges!
3 brands of equipment with very different philosophies:
Falcon industrie : agility and reactivity
Wolf Tech : the most advanced technology for combat use
Rhino Corp: raw power.

Equip your ship with 5 of the 45 weapons available (Blaster, Rocket, Plasma, Electric...), customize it and adapt your weaponry to the situation.

During the challenges, you'll have to attack enemy ships, withstand meteor showers, defend planet Earth by developing its passive defenses... And many more surprises await you.

The year is 2085, the year of the 17th Space Show.
It's the most watched reality show in the solar system: 32 billion viewers! The concept is simple: 13 million contestants compete against each other. Their agility, fighting skills and ability to implement an effective strategy will make the difference.

The winner will receive a "molecular reconstruction chip" giving him/her access to immortality.

name: Space Show edition 17 Demo
short_description: Nervous, dynamic space shooter. Pass all the tests and become THE BEST.
